name: ZKEncrypt AI
description: ZKEncrypt AI is a decentralized application (DApp) platform engineered to serve as a high-fidelity reference implementation for privacy-preserving AI computation on the Solana blockchain. This project provides the definitive architecture for integrating advanced, confidential compute paradigms within a high-throughput Web3 ecosystem. The platform's core thesis is that the future of on-chain AI necessitates absolute data confidentiality. ZKEncrypt AI achieves this by implementing a robust Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) infrastructure. This enables AI agents to perform complex computations—such as inference or data analysis—directly on user-supplied ciphertext. At no point in the compute lifecycle is the underlying plaintext data exposed to the AI model, node operators, or any network-level observers.
